description:
In this course you'll learn how to choose the perfect web host and web hosting account for your circumstances.

[last update: 1st March 2016]

"I have also decided to upgrade my hosting package choice due to several things Neil pointed out." (5-stars, Crystal Whiting, Feb 2016)

"I have never seen a hosting presentation better then this one." (5-stars, Anthony DeCurtis, Feb 2016)

"The instructor makes all the lectures clear and concise. Thanks Neil for another fantastic course." (5-stars, David Mackay, Jan 2016)

Choosing a web-host is often a difficult, but important task for anyone starting an Internet-based business. It often seems confusing because there are many web-hosting accounts to choose from, and a huge number of features offered by each web-host. How can you decide?

This course will take you through everything in a step-by-step manner. You'll learn about the different types of web-hosting accounts and all the different features they offer, with full explanations of jargon along the way. :)

I've had web-hosting accounts since 1997, or 1996 if you include free webspace. I've had everything from free webspace to shared web-hosting accounts, to three dedicated servers running at the same time! I can help you choose the right type of web-hosting account with the right features at the right web-host!

After the introductions, we look at the different types of web-hosting account, from shared to reseller, to Virtual Private Servers, dedicated servers and cloud hosting.

We then look in detail at as many different web-hosting features as I could think of, and I try to explain what each feature is, what it does and how important it is likely to be in your choice of web-host.

In the next section, we consider which reviews of web-hosting we can use to help make a decision, and which are biased.

Finally, we look at common web-host problems and check to see if we can spot them before signing up with a web-host.

After taking this course you will know how to decide which web-hosting account is right for you and which features you'll want the account to have. You'll also know which reviews can help you decide whether or not to go with a particular web-host, and which problems to look for before signing up.

This course is aimed at beginners, but more experienced people may also find value in it.
title: Web Hosting Essentials: Right Web Host + Web Hosting Account
